Source.Name: kaption
Source.Summary: A KDE utility similar to Jing or Skitch not yet as powerful as them
Source.Description: A KDE utility similar to Jing or Skitch not yet as powerful as them ;) Nice, but what is it? It's an app that sit in the systray, left clicking the icon you can capture a screen region to draw arrows, boxes and text on it, than you can save the result.
